com.jayway.restassured.mapper.factory

Interface ObjectMapperFactory<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the created object mapper.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GsonObjectMapperFactory, Jackson1ObjectMapperFactory, Jackson2ObjectMapperFactory, JAXBObjectMapperFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGsonObjectMapperFactory, DefaultJackson1ObjectMapperFactory, DefaultJackson2ObjectMapperFactory, DefaultJAXBObjectMapperFactory

    public interface ObjectMapperFactory<T>
    The base interface for object mapper factories.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T create(Class cls, String charset)
      Create the object mapper instance.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        T create(Class cls,
         String charset)
        Create the object mapper instance.
        Parameters:
        cls - The type of the class to serialize or de-serialize
        charset - The charset
        Returns:
        An object mapper instance
